mapper.select: select c1.ID as city_id, c1.NAME as city_name, c1.COUNTRY_CODE as city_country_code, c1.DISTRICT as city_district, c1.POPULATION as city_population, c2.CODE as country_code, c2.NAME as country_name, c2.CONTINENT as country_continent, c2.REGION as country_region, c2.SURFACE_AREA as country_surface_area, c2.INDEP_YEAR as country_indep_year, c2.POPULATION as country_population, c2.LIFE_EXPECTANCY as country_life_expectancy, c2.GNP as country_gnp, c2.GNP_OLD as country_gnp_old, c2.LOCALNAME as country_local_name, c2.GOVERNMENT_FORM as country_government_form, c2.HEAD_OF_STATE as country_head_of_state, c2.CAPITAL as country_capital, c2.CODE2 as country_code2 from city c1 left outer join country c2 on c1.country_code = c2.code WHERE c1.country_code = 'KOR'
